newsitem.title: PERU: Peru sees 1996 GDP growth 2.5 pct vs 7.0 pct.
newsitem.headline: Peru sees 1996 GDP growth 2.5 pct vs 7.0 pct.

text.p: Peru's Economy Minister Jorge Camet told Congress Wednesday the government estimated the economy would grow around 2.5 percent this year, down from 7.0 percent last year.
"We hope in December to close the year with a growth rate of 2.5 percent," Camet said.
